author: kilasuit
body:
During installation the installer should show that telemetry is being collected and that it can be disabled.

The installer should also allows for pwsh to be installed and turn telemetry off via cmdline parameter or via UI install screen

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body: I think this would go a _long_ way towards assuaging the concerns of folks who don't like the telemetry. The ability to opt in or out _on install_ is much more visible and actionable than an environment var is. Fantastic idea! 💖

comments.author: sba923
comments.body: I presume there is some doc about what telemetry actually collects?

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
> I presume there is some doc about what telemetry actually collects? https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/module/microsoft.powershell.core/about/about_telemetry?view=powershell-7.1
about Telemetry - PowerShell
Describes the telemetry collected in PowerShell and how to opt-out.

title: Add option to turn off telemetry as part of install process
